description:
Get involved in a mystery story, while you collect all the necessary clues to solve the case.

Your grandfather has disappeared in strange circumstances, he is the owner of the old beach bar and maybe that place hides some important clue.

Will you be able to find out what happened?
First chapter of a series of scape rooms, which will invite you to find out the events surrounding the disappearance. Visit the places he frequented and discover an incredible story of mystery and fantasy.

Features:
- Manage to advance through different scenarios using logic. Pay attention to details.
- Explore a place full of memories about the stories your grandfather told you.
- Be thorough, this place hides a big secret.
- Collect souvenirs that will help you solve the riddles.

Play this game set in an isolated beach with a beach bar closed under strange circumstances. Prove that you are the best detective.
To be continued in future episodes...
name: Beach Cafe: Caribbean Sand
